name: Roadhog
description: Roadhog is a durable killer with a Scrap Gun thatâ€™s devastating at close range. Few enemies can escape him and his fearsome hook

abilities.name: Chain Hook
abilities.description: Drag a targeted enemy to you.

abilities.name: Take a Breather
abilities.description: Heal yourself and reduce damage taken over a short time.

abilities.name: Whole Hog
abilities.description: Damage and knock back enemies in front of you.

story: Roadhog is a ruthless masked killer with a reputation for destruction. Roaming the irradiated, wreckage-littered Australian outback, his only known associate (and many wonder why) is the manic young Junker criminal known as Junkrat.
